WorkItem.Description: I have a French (Canadian) Windows 7 64 bits computer. When I click om program's icon, I see program's name in Process Viewer, and it suddenly disappears. I suspect it doesn't find directory and stops. In previous versions, it loaded despite this error. Now it stops and there's absolutely no way to correct settings. I've got a disk problem and I have to recreate folders names myself. I suppose Windows no longer knows Special Directory Downloads is Téléchargements in FRench.
WorkItem.Summary: Program is not launching probably due to a settings problem

Comments.Message:
Hello Cmarcotte

Thanks for reporting the problem.  Our engineers are investigating the issue.  I will update you again as soon as we reproduce the error.

Thanks
Jialiang Ge

Hello

We have just released a fix for this problem. Could you please reopen the sample browser to get the auto-update, and let me know if it works for you now?

Thanks
Jialiang Ge

It is working fine now. The program launched, I got an error message about a folder problem. I had no problem to get setting menu and setting my own folder.

Thanks a lot.
